Sentencas: Synthesis and deposit of perovskite La1-xSrxMnO3+/-delta used as cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells are achieved in one step in a low pressure RF plasma reactor equipped with a convergent nozzle.
Titulo: Production of perovskite deposits for fuel cells by plasma process

Sentencas: The role of annealing on the crystallisation of the deposits is considered.
Titulo: Production of perovskite deposits for fuel cells by plasma process

Sentencas: Electron diffraction analysis showed that the sample belongs to rhombohedral system.
Titulo: Production of perovskite deposits for fuel cells by plasma process

Sentencas: Impedance measurements showed the role of plasma parameters on the electrical conductivity of deposits.
Titulo: Production of perovskite deposits for fuel cells by plasma process

Sentencas: Oxygen and hydroxyl radicals produced by plasma are found to be the major reactive species that lead to the transformation of nitrate precursors into perovskites in this process.
Titulo: Production of perovskite deposits for fuel cells by plasma process
